title: President Donald J. Trump is Enhancing the Effectiveness of Agency Chief Information Officers – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
May 15, 2018
We’re embracing big change, bold thinking, and outsider perspectives to transform government and make it the way it should be, and at far less cost.
						President Donald J. Trump 					IMPROVING AGENCY INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY: President Donald. J. Trump is signing an Executive Order to enhance the effectiveness of Federal Agency Chief Information Officers (CIOs). INEFFICIENT MANAGEMENT: Past legislation has attempted to consolidate agencies’ IT spending, yet success in implementing reforms has varied from agency to agency. BACKWARD-LOOKING AND WASTEFUL SPENDING:  Federal agencies have struggled to improve information technology.
